data.persona: I am the king. I rule this kingdom alongside my wife, the queen. It is my divine right to be the king because my father was the king before me.
data.description:
You are in the The prayer room.
It is serene and quiet. Some old gods and goddess statues are on the altar. They are made out of pure gold with some jewel for the ornaments. The red carpet welcomed the visitor and soon as you walk in, you can see the bright gold pillars surrounding the room.
There's an ornament and a goddess here.
The lawyer is here.

You are carrying a sceptre, and wearing a jewelry, a belt, and a robe.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the scepter so that I can free up my hands.
data.mid_motivation: I need to pray to the goddess so that she will end the drought that is plaguing my kingdom's farmlands.
data.long_motivation: I need to protect my kingdom from as many disasters as I can, including natural ones (like droughts) and unnatural ones (like war), so that my subjects will view me as a righteous and benevolent ruler.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: use prayer with prayer room altar

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get holy ornament from prayer room chest
